get.description: Returns a paginated list of customers with optional filtering based on various parameters.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter by customer name

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Filter by exact customer email

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Filter by exact partner ID associated with the customer

parameters.name: discount
parameters.description: Filter by discount rate

partner_id.description: Identifier for the partner associated with the customer

discount.description: Discount rate applicable to the customer

post.description: Creates a new customer record in the database.

partner_id.description: Identifier for the partner associated with the customer

discount.description: Discount rate applicable to the customer

errors.example: Object with all the errors by field

get.description: Returns a single customer by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the customer to return

partner_id.description: Identifier for the partner associated with the customer

discount.description: Discount rate applicable to the customer

put.description: Updates a customer's record in the database and returns the updated customer.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the customer to update

partner_id.description: Identifier for the partner associated with the customer

discount.description: Discount rate applicable to the customer

errors.example: Object with all the errors by field

delete.description: Deletes a specific customer by ID and returns no content.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the customer to delete

get.description: Returns a paginated list of partners with optional filtering based on various parameters.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter by partner name

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Filter by exact partner email

parameters.name: commission
parameters.description: Filter by commission rate

post.description: Creates a new partner record in the database.

errors.example: Object with all the errors by field

get.description: Returns a single partner by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the partner to return

put.description: Updates a partner's record in the database and returns the updated partner.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the partner to update

errors.example: Object with all the errors by field

delete.description: Deletes a specific partner by ID and returns no content.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the partner to delete

get.description: Returns paginated list of suppliers with navigation links.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter suppliers by name

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Filter suppliers by exact email

parameters.name: max_due_days
parameters.description: Filter suppliers by maximum due days

parameters.name: contract_file
parameters.description: Filter suppliers by contract file presence

from.description: First item number on the current page

path.description: Base path for the paginated links

to.description: Last item number on the current page

post.description: Creates a new supplier and returns the newly created supplier.

max_due_days.description: Maximum number of due days allowed

contract_file.description: Path to the contract file associated with the supplier

email.description: The email address of the supplier

max_due_days.description: The maximum number of due days allowed for the supplier

contract_file.description: The file path for the contract file associated with the supplier

errors.example: Object with all the errors by field

get.description: Returns a single supplier by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the supplier to return

email.description: The email address of the supplier

max_due_days.description: The maximum number of due days allowed for the supplier

contract_file.description: The file path for the contract file associated with the supplier

put.description: Updates a supplier identified by ID and returns the updated supplier.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the supplier to update

max_due_days.description: Maximum number of due days allowed

contract_file.description: Path to the contract file associated with the supplier

email.description: The email address of the supplier

max_due_days.description: The maximum number of due days allowed for the supplier

contract_file.description: The file path for the contract file associated with the supplier

errors.example: Object with all the errors by field

delete.description: Deletes a specific supplier by ID and returns no content.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the supplier to delete

id.description: The unique identifier of the customer

partner_id.description: Identifier for the partner associated with the customer

discount.description: Discount rate applicable to the customer
